price: Na wͻn ntam ne nkuro a Yɛahyira wͻn no (ntam nso) Yεmaa nkuro a εda adi pefee bεdaa hͻ, na Yεhyehyεε akwantuo gyinaberε wͻ mu (maa wͻn, εna Yεka kyerεε wͻn sε): “Montu kwan wͻ mu anadwo ne adekyeε wͻ abodwoɔ mu“.
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا بَيۡنَهُمۡ وَبَيۡنَ ٱلۡقُرَى ٱلَّتِي بَٰرَكۡنَا فِيهَا قُرٗى ظَٰهِرَةٗ وَقَدَّرۡنَا فِيهَا ٱلسَّيۡرَۖ سِيرُواْ فِيهَا لَيَالِيَ وَأَيَّامًا ءَامِنِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā baynahum wabayna al-qurā allatī bāraknā fīhā quran ẓāhiratan waqaddarnā fīhā al-sayra sīrū fīhā layāliya wa-ayyāman āminīna
